sentences.sContent: The building is grey, formidable, not at all picturesque.
sentences.sCn: 那幢建筑呈灰色，气势凛然，与漂亮沾不上边。

sentences.sContent: The new range of computers have formidable processing power.
sentences.sCn: 该系列的新型计算机处理能力惊人。

sentences.sContent: ...A formidable wall of bureaucracy has been erected to protect their prime nesting on the Atlantic coastlines...

exam.question: Among all the changes resulting from the ______ entry of women into the work force, the transformation that has occurred in the women themselves is not the least important.

answer.explain: 句意： 在大量妇女成为社会劳动力所带来的所有变化中， 妇女自身的转变更为重要。quantitative： 数量的， 定量的； surplus： 过剩的， 剩余的。

synos.tran: 强大的；可怕的；令人敬畏的；艰难的

remMethod.val: for ＋ mid(看作mad) ＋ able → 为此而疯的 → 可怕的

words.tran: 强大地；难对付地；可怕地

trans.tranCn: 可怕的；令人敬畏的，令人惊叹的
trans.tranOther: very powerful or impressive, and often frightening
